command.error: An error occurred while trying to execute the **{{command}}** command. Try again later.
command.disabled: The **{{command}}** command has been disabled by the developers.
command.guildOnly: The **{{command}}** command can only be used inside a guild.
command.notFound: The **{{command}}** command is no longer available.
command.devOnly: The **{{command}}** command can only be used by developers.
command.cooldown: Please wait `{{time}}` more before reusing the **{{command}}** command.
command.noBotPerm:
I am unable to execute the **{{command}}** command in {{channel}} because I lack these permissions -
{{perms}}
command.botPerm:
I am unable to execute the **{{command}}** command because I lack these permissions -
{{perms}}
command.userPerm:
You need to have these permissions to execute the **{{command}}** command - 
{{perms}}
command.voiceOnly: You must join a **Voice Channel** before using the **{{command}}** command.
command.missingVoicePerm: I am unable to **join** {{channel}} or **speak** in there.
command.noRequestToSpeak: I don't have **__REQUEST TO SPEAK__** permission in __{{channel}}__ to execute the **{{command}}** command.
command.differentVoiceChannel: You are not connected to **{{channel}}** to use this command.
command.missingArgsDescription: Please provide the required arguments for the `{{command}}` command.
command.noMentionEveryone: You can't use this command with everyone or here. Please use slash command.
command.voteMessage: Wait! You need to vote on top.gg to use this command. Thanks.
command.no_voice_channel_queue: You are not connected to a voice channel to queue songs.
command.no_dj_permission: You need to have the DJ role to use this command.

prefixMention:
Hey, my prefix for this server is **__{{prefix}}__**. Want more info? then do `{{prefix}}help`
Stay Safe, Stay Awesome!

context.guildOnly: ‚ùå Context menu commands only work in guilds.
context.notFound: The context menu command is not available at the moment.
context.disabled: The context menu command was **disabled** by the developers.
context.devOnly: The context menu command is only **accessible** to the developers.
context.cooldown: Please wait, you are on a cooldown. You can use it again {{timestamp}}.
context.botPermission: I need {{p}} to execute this context menu command.
context.userPermission: You need {{p}} to use this context menu command.
context.error: An error occurred while trying to execute the context menu command. Try again later.

interaction.setup_channel: You can't use this command in the setup channel.
